article_title: Blue Cross and Blue Shield of Illinois lays off 60, including 27 in Springfield

article_metadata.description: Blue Cross and Blue Shield of Illinois remains in "growth mode" despite laying off 60 people, including 27 in Springfield, this spring and summer, officials from the state's largest health insurance company said Wednesday."They were valued employees," Blue Cross spokesman Mike Deering said of the laid-off workers. "We really do value our employees at these local locations."The job eliminations in eight Illinois communities, including Jacksonville and Quincy, occurred while overall employment at
article_metadata.author: Dean Olsen, Staff Writer
